definition: Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: My name is Lin Lixia and I am presently studying as a senior at Zhongshan University.
sentences.chinese: 我叫林麗霞，目前是中山大學四年級的學生。

sentences.english: Master thesis, Department of Marine Resources, National Sun Yat-sen University, 90 pp.
sentences.chinese: 國立中山大學海洋資源研究所，碩士論文，90頁。

sentences.english: I'll soon graduate from Zhongshan University, majoring in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡快畢業的中山大學，主修會計。

sentences.english: Master Thesis, Department of Marine Resources, National Sun Yat-sen University, 129 pp.
sentences.chinese: 國立中山大學海洋資源研究所，碩士論文，129頁。

sentences.english: Why dosen't Sun Yat-sen University blow out such a scandal?
sentences.chinese: 爲何就不見中山大學爆出這樣的醜聞？

sentences.english: Hu might accept an invitation to teach at Sun Yat-Sen University in Guangzhou, Zhang said.
sentences.chinese: 張立暉稱，胡舒立辭職後，可能應邀赴中山大學任教。

sentences.english: Sun Hongyun Professor, History School, Sun Yat—sen University.
sentences.chinese: 孫宏雲，中山大學歷史系副教授。

sentences.english: The company is attached to the Sun Yatsen University Research Institute in Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 該公司與廣東的知名學府中山大學有些關係。

sentences.english: He received his M. E. in Mechanical Engineering and Automation from Shen Zhen University in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年畢業於中山大學，獲光學工程碩士學位。

sentences.english: All applicants must be currently enrolled as a full-time student at Lingnan University or Sun Yat-sen University during 2011-2012.
sentences.chinese: 申請者必須爲嶺南大學及中山大學的全日制在讀學生。

sentences.english: The establishment of the Sun Yat-Sen University was the fruit of Party education.
sentences.chinese: 中山大學的創辦即是黨化教育的成果。

definition: Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
